Matt texts you randomly, his parents are out, and he invites you around.
Call for Robbie, who's girlfriend is ill, because he's finished rugby training.
154.content:
Narrative:
James and Elliot were identical, nearly. They were both 15 years old, and studied at the same school, and were in all the same classes, and had all the same friends. They were of foreign descent- their father was from Turkey, giving the boys' skin a smooth tan and their hair it's thickness and it's rich, black colour.

James and Elliot were incredible athletes; they dominated all events. They participated in contests all around London, they'd made a name at other schools and clubs. All the girls lusted them (even if it was just a little). The head teacher at Saint Marks R.C School adored the boys. Forever praising them and rewarding them. He even once described them as "squeaky-clean Angels" at a parent's evening. Their life was perfect; almost. Almost.. due to the fact James liked girls, and Elliot liked boys.

James would obsess like the other boys in the friend group, peaking through the dangerous hole that exposed the girls in the guys' locker room, all whilst Elliot would look at the boys' bums as they bent down to look through the hole. The boys in the group consisted of:
1.Matt. With his brown quiff bouncing around, he was the school's heartthrob. If you aren't Matt Wellodor, you're not important. He wasn't rude or mean, and he had very lovely, fun banter with several people. He was a talented footballer and enjoyed a thriving social life. "That boy will make something of himself" People would say.. He was James's best mate, and Elliot always liked him; he always hoped for a little more than friendship though.
2.Robbie. Robbie was the big, strong, yet cute, rugby player. He had a girlfriend, Sasha-Mae, who kept him closer than she keeps her clothing on her body. Robbie was, when he could, very cuddly with the lads- always play-fighting, having a laugh, sitting on the guys' faces. James thought Robbie was the funniest guy he knew, Elliot agreed- and also thought Robbie had the best rear in the year, he liked bums.
3.Tyler. Tyler, with his rough Dougie Poynter like hair, was tall and had a nice jaw that he was complimented for a lot. He was quite a different boy; smoked a lot of things he shouldn't and always liked a flirt with anyone. He was quite slobby, even though his physique was toned and slim. He looked after the boys, he was quite clever and leading. James wouldn't say anything bad ever about Tyler, but Elliot found him annoying; he would pinch Elliot's bum after and wink, to wind him up. Elliot sometimes wondered if the smart boy had found out...

James didn't know about Elliot- Elliot was scared if he ever knew, James didn't seem very compassionate or caring, the guys didn't know neither. James made jokes with the guys about each other being "fags", and Elliot would have to choke up a laugh and a wince of his lips so he would evade being caught. He had a few girlfriends- but it never lasted. The girls were never the one for Elliot, so the guys just mistook it as Elliot was the sensitive one. James was the player. It was like swimming with sharks everyday for Elliot, but, it changed. Quickly...

"James! Give me my sneaker back! I'm going for a run." Elliot demanded- James was being a wind-up again, stealing Elliot's right sneaker. It was a beaten old Nike air max, it's sole proud with the dust of thousands of training sessions on it's heal.
James lifted the sneaker up to his nose and took a whiff... "God!-" He gagged, "That's worse than mine! Bro, you reek!"
"I doubt it's worse than yours James..." Elliot slyly dissed his brother.
The dominant twin giggled- "You're right; but smell it anyway." And at the moment, James pushed his twin down onto the bed, secured the fighting arms down with his knees, and had his crotch parallel to his bound twin's mouth.
"James get o!-" Elliot tried to shout, but his brother quickly covered his mouth with his hand.
"Shut your trap and sniff!" James softly laughed, and he lowered the opening of the Nike slowly down onto his brother's nose like he actually was trying to build horror and suspense. Poor Elliot...

And from now on, Elliot's Perspective:
My battered shoe was coming down slowly- I was tense and on-edge. I held my breathe- I'd drowned that shoe in hard-work and sweat- something I'd like to be proud of from a safe distance. James looked down at me, and I couldn't hear him laughing, I just saw his rich, brown eyes and thought that this is what it's going to be like. Boys pinning me down, making me do humiliating things that I'll never want to do. They'll call me "Gay Boy" and "Bender". But then I was shocked out of my train of thought; the strong malodorant that was my foot stink! It was toxic; a bitter-sweet vinegar like pong, thick and mixed with the stench of a dirty block of cheese. I gagged a little, but that just made it worse: it made James laugh, and he just pushed it down harder, and when I gagged, I had to breathe afterwards. With my mouth blocked, I took a deep whiff. It could of stun a horse! It was pungent and horrible and degrading, and- and..
I loved it. I was a boy's bitch- and the fact it was my brother, well, made it dirtier...

I got an erection, and I was scared of getting caught. I slowly stuttered my eye lids to make it look like I had passed out.
James took the shoe of my nose then and shook me to see if I was okay- I had to be clever and wait until he got off.
He did- he panicked and paced the room.

That's when I grabbed the sneaker out of his hand, grasp the other of the floor, and darted. I wasn't staying there with him. It was a Friday, around 7 o'clock, Mum and Dad wanted me out the house anyway- I was about to go have a great night.
154.title: Brother tortures Brother
